creditline: The Suzanne S. Roberts Fund for Asian Art
description: small apron with blue front panel with white, light green and orange lines and designs in embroidery; stiff crescent-shaped top portion with seven metal star-shaped studs; strap and front have brown tassels with white and black beads
dimension: 17 5/16 x 10 1/16 in. (43.97 x 25.56 cm) (front panel only)
title: Apron
